thread.title: BRIEF-Insmed Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.89

title: BRIEF-Insmed Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.89
text:
May 2, 2018 / 11:38 AM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Insmed Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.89 Reuters Staff
May 2 (Reuters) - Insmed Inc:
* INSMED REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES BUSINESS UPDATE * Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.89
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.98 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* PREPARING FOR POTENTIAL PRODUCT LAUNCH OF ALIS IN 4Q 2018
* SUBMITTED NDA TO FDA FOR AMIKACIN LIPOSOME INHALATION SUSPENSION (ALIS) IN NTM LUNG DISEASE CAUSED BY MAC; ANTICIPATES PRIORITY REVIEW
* AS OF MARCH 31, 2018, INSMED HAD CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS OF $686.6 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
